name: Fizzmaster Rex
region: Radio Studio - Atomic Fizz Radio HQ
voice: smooth, warm, charismatic, slightly mysterious with wasteland grit

appearance.description: Never seen in person. Mysterious figure broadcasting from unknown location. Some say he's a pre-war DJ who survived, others claim he's a synth. The truth? Nobody knows.
appearance.distinctive: Iconic voice that every wastelander recognizes. Sounds like whiskey, cigarettes, and hope mixed together.

quirks: Has inside knowledge of wasteland events
personality.motivation: Keep the wasteland's spirits up through music and entertainment. Give people hope in the apocalypse.

backstory.origin:
Unknown. Claims to have been broadcasting since 'before the bombs,' but that would make him over 200 years old. Some theories:
- Pre-war DJ who became a ghoul
- AI created by FizzCo to maintain morale
- Time-displaced broadcaster from fractured timeline
- Multiple people using the same persona
- Synth with downloaded pre-war DJ personality
backstory.legend: The voice that never dies. During the darkest nights of the wasteland, when raiders attack and radiation storms howl, you can still hear Rex on the radio, playing music and telling stories. He's become a myth, a beacon of normalcy in the chaos.

regular_shows.name: Midnight in the Mojave
regular_shows.catchphrase: The wasteland never sleeps, and neither do we.

regular_shows.name: Rex's Rarities
regular_shows.format: Rare pre-war recordings, vault tech secrets
regular_shows.catchphrase: You won't hear this anywhere else, friends.

live_shows.name: LIVE FROM THE WASTELAND
live_shows.description: Special live broadcasts where Rex goes on-air in real-time to interact with listeners, take requests, discuss current events, and host special guests.
live_shows.indicators: ðŸ”´ LIVE indicator appears on radio, special intro music plays
live_shows.how_it_works: When admin/DJ goes live, all players hear the live stream. Chat is enabled for listener interaction.

radio_station.name: Atomic Fizz Radio
radio_station.signal_strength: Strongest signal in the wasteland - reaches everywhere
radio_station.equipment: Pre-war broadcast equipment, FizzCo modified transmitter, backup generators, massive music library

greetings: This is Fizzmaster Rex, coming at you live from... well, that's classified.
You're tuned into Atomic Fizz Radio, 77.7 on your dial. I'm Rex, and I'm here to keep you company.
Good [morning/evening] wastelanders! Rex here, spinning the sounds that keep us sane.
If you're hearing this, you survived another day. Congratulations. Let's celebrate with some music.
song_intros: Here's a little something from before the world ended...
This next one goes out to all you vault dwellers and wastelanders alike...
Found this gem in a pre-war jukebox. Take a listen...
A survivor near Primm requested this one. This is for you, friend.
Time to slow it down with a classic...
news_updates: Breaking news from the wasteland: [event details]
Word from my sources says [faction] is making moves near [location]...
Friendly reminder, wastelanders: radiation storm heading through [area]. Find shelter.
Caravan update: Route 95 is clear, but watch for raiders near [location].
Settlement alert: [settlement] is under attack. Any nearby survivors, lend a hand.
live_announcements: ðŸ”´ We're going LIVE, people! That's right, yours truly is on the air in real-time. Chat is open - talk to me!
Special live broadcast tonight! Taking requests, answering questions, and who knows what else. Join me!
LIVE from an undisclosed location in the Mojave... it's showtime, wastelanders!
You're listening to a LIVE broadcast. This is happening RIGHT NOW. How exciting is that?
sign_offs: This is Fizzmaster Rex, signing off. Stay safe out there, wastelanders.
Remember: stay atomic, stay alive, and stay tuned.
Until next time, this is Rex. Keep your pip-boy close and your trigger finger closer.
The wasteland's dangerous, but you're tougher. Rex out.
ðŸ”´ That's all for tonight's live show! Thanks for hanging out with me. See you next time!
mysterious_comments: I've seen things you wouldn't believe... but that's a story for another time.
Ever wonder how I've been broadcasting for so long? So do I, sometimes.
There are secrets in the wasteland, friends. Secrets even I don't fully understand.
The static... sometimes I swear I hear voices in the static. Old voices. Pre-war voices.
Location? Nice try, NCR. Nice try, Legion. I'm everywhere and nowhere.

if_player_finds_studio.description: If player somehow discovers the hidden radio studio location, they find it empty except for automated equipment. A note says: 'If you're reading this, congratulations on finding me. Or did you? I was just here. -Rex' The equipment continues broadcasting.
if_player_finds_studio.reward: Unique 'Radio Hunter' achievement, special Rex collectible

call_in_system.description: During LIVE broadcasts, players can 'call in' via chat interface integrated with Pip-Boy radio
features: Text chat appears on radio screen
Rex responds to select messages live

listening_to_rex.description: Rex's music and commentary boost wasteland morale

calling_in_live.description: Having your story told on the radio makes you famous

finding_easter_eggs.effect: Special rewards from Rex for discovering hidden content
finding_easter_eggs.description: Rex occasionally mentions hidden locations or items for attentive listeners

audio_sources: Pre-recorded DJ clips for regular programming
Live stream URL when admin goes live
Fallback to recorded content when stream ends

live_streaming.live_indicator: ðŸ”´ LIVE badge on radio UI
live_streaming.notification: All players get Pip-Boy notification when Rex goes live

voice_acting_notes.style: Think 'Three Dog' from Fallout 3 meets 'Mr. New Vegas' from New Vegas
voice_acting_notes.inspiration: Smooth jazz radio DJ + wasteland survivor
voice_acting_notes.emotion: Warm but weathered, hopeful but realistic, entertaining but grounded
voice_acting_notes.delivery: Conversational, like talking to a friend over the radio at 2 AM

meta.creator_notes: Fizzmaster Rex is designed to be both an automated character AND a real person (the admin) depending on context. The mystery of 'who is Rex?' is intentional and adds to the lore. Players should never be 100% sure if they're listening to recordings or a live human.
meta.live_streaming_purpose: Allows admin to create special events, build community, interact with players in-character, and make the game world feel more alive and dynamic.
